definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to long for/to crave for/to greatly desire
hungry and thirsty/(fig.) to crave (knowledge, love etc)
to hunger for sth (idiom); eagerly/to long for sth
lit. drinking poison in the hope of quenching one's thirst (idiom)/fig. a supposed remedy that only makes matters worse
condition characterized by thirst, hunger, frequent urination and weight loss, identified in TCM with type 2 diabetes
lit. to quench one's thirst by thinking of plums (idiom)/fig. to console oneself with illusions
lit. distant water does not cure present thirst; fig. urgent need/a slow remedy does not address immediate needs
pinyin: yuan3 shui3 bu4 jie3 jin4 ke3

definition: lit. not to dig a well until one is thirsty/to be unprepared and seek help at the last minute (idiom)
to allay one's hunger and slake one's thirst (idiom)
to be so thirsty as to no longer be able to tolerate it

sentences.english: Drinking tea with honey is good for our health.
Always drink when you are thirsty, and have water available during the day to hydrate regularly.
sentences.chinese: 總是喝當你渴了，有水可在白天到水合物定期。

sentences.english: It makes you insanely hungry and thirsty.
sentences.chinese: 它讓你瘋狂的感到餓和渴。

sentences.english: Goldfarb's advice: Just drink when you're thirsty.
Bruce was too thirsty; he drank two more glasses of water.
sentences.chinese: 布魯斯渴極了，他又喝了兩杯水。

sentences.english: Thirsty?" Grampy asked, never removing the pipe from his mouth."
sentences.chinese: “渴嗎？”祖父菸斗不離口地問我。

sentences.english: All this talk about sin has made me thirsty again."[qh]
sentences.chinese: 說了這麼多關於罪行的看法，我又渴了。

sentences.english: Thirsty, drink a few mouthfuls of springs, sweet Toru bottom of my heart.
sentences.chinese: 渴了，喝上幾口清泉，甜徹心底。

sentences.english: I can quench your thirst for eternity, not just in this moment.
sentences.chinese: 我可以解你們永生的渴，而不僅僅是此刻。

sentences.english: Furthermore, it enhances thirst and stimulates the secretion of the antidiuretic hormone.
sentences.chinese: 此外，它改善了渴，刺激抗利尿激素分泌的。

sentences.english: After an exhausting day, we returned to our lodgings, tired and thirsty.
sentences.chinese: 由於忙碌了一天，回到住所後，我們感到又累又渴。

sentences.english: Everybody felt more or less thirsty.
Thirst, though, should be your guide.
sentences.chinese: 不過，渴應該成爲你的嚮導。

sentences.english: I will buy a bottle of water if I get thirsty on the journey.
sentences.chinese: 如果在旅途中我渴了，我就會買瓶水。

sentences.english: I paint you and fashion  you ever with my love longings.
sentences.chinese: 我永遠用愛戀的渴想來描畫你。

definition: lit. dry mouth and tongue (idiom); to talk too much
hungry and thirsty/(fig.) to crave (knowledge, love etc)

the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)
